      Returns:
      the interaction panel of the videoBox

      Sets up the Center Panel, that is the panel that contains the video player and the summary panel

      private void setupSummaryPanel()
      Creates the summary panel, that is the panel that contains the summary of the interactions and question attached to the video.

    • setupShowInteractionButton

      private void setupShowInteractionButton()
      Sets up the showInteratcionButton, that is the button that will show all the interactions and question in the interaction panel.

    • displayInteractionPanel

      private void displayInteractionPanel()
      This method forces the interactionPanel to populate its interactionList for the video that this StatisticsPane is handling. It then displays all the interactions in the interaction panel and creates the questionPanel that shows the questions that have been posted by students for the current video.

    • createQuestionsPanels

      private void createQuestionsPanels()

      Returns:

    • listen

      public void listen​(Event event)
      Description copied from interface: Listener
      The listen method is overwritten from all classes that implement this interface. Each class will handle the Event that they receive and will act accordingly
      Specified by:
      listen in interface Listener
      Parameters:
      event - generic event received from a dispatch method of some other classes. This event can be extended in other subclasses in order to implement the polimorphysm.
